recipe.title: Cookie Dough 'Box' Cupcakes Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 box ; vanilla cake mix, prepared according to package instructions
8 oz ; chocolate chip cookie dough, 1 tube ; (225 g)

steps.step: In a large bowl, prepare the cake batter.
Divide the batter evenly among a lined muffin tin, filling halfway.
Place a small ball of cookie dough on each, then top with remaining batter, filling about ¾ of the way up.
Pipe the frosting onto each cupcake, then top with chocolate chips.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large bowl, prepare the cake batter.
Divide the batter evenly among a lined muffin tin, filling halfway.
Place a small ball of cookie dough on each, then top with remaining batter, filling about ¾ of the way up.
Pipe the frosting onto each cupcake, then top with chocolate chips.
